TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 LINQ to SQL 框架的主入口点。

span.span: Represents the main entry point for the LINQ to SQL framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是通过数据库连接映射的所有实体的源。The is the source of all entities mapped over a database connection. 它会跟踪对检索到的所有实体所做的更改并维护的"标识缓存"的实体检索不止一次保证由使用相同的对象实例。It tracks changes that you made to all retrieved entities and maintains an "identity cache" that guarantees that entities retrieved more than one time are represented by using the same object instance. 一般情况下，实例旨在最后一个"工作单元"但是你的应用程序定义的术语。In general, a instance is designed to last for one "unit of work" however your application defines that term. 一个是轻量而不是创建开销很大。A is lightweight and is not expensive to create. 典型[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]应用程序创建实例的生存期较短的类的表示逻辑组的成员或在方法范围内相关的数据库操作。A typical [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] application creates instances at method scope or as a member of short-lived classes that represent a logical set of related database operations.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 你所使用的连接字符串可为 ADO.NET 连接字符串。

span.span: The connection string you use can be an ADO.NET connection string.

summary.span: 你还可以指定 SQL Server Express 或 SQL Server Compact 文件的文件名。

span.span: You can also specify a filename to a SQL Server Express or SQL Server Compact file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Data.IDbConnection connection) cil managed

param.name: connection
param.span: 由 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 使用的连接。

span.span: The connection used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

summary.span: 通过引用由 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 使用的连接来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by referencing the connection used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个打开和关闭的连接或连接字符串提供，如果需要关闭数据库连接。A opens and closes a database connection as needed if you provide a closed connection or a connection string. 一般情况下，您应永远不会需要致电`Dispose`上。In general, you should never have to call `Dispose` on a . 如果提供的打开连接，将不会关闭它。If you provide an open connection, the will not close it. 因此，不实例化具有打开的连接除非您有一个充分的理由要这样做。Therefore, do not instantiate a with an open connection unless you have a good reason to do this. 在中事务，将不打开或关闭的连接，为了避免出现提升。In a transaction, a will not open or close a connection to avoid promotion.

member this.CommandTimeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值增大查询的超时期限，如果不增大则会在默认超时期限间出现超时。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that increases the time-out period for queries that would otherwise time out during the default time-out period.

value.span: 一个整数值，该值增大查询的超时期限，如果不增大则会在默认超时期限间出现超时。

span.span: An integer value that increases the time-out period for queries that would otherwise time out during the default time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置用于执行生成的命令的命令超时值 (`IDbCommands`)。This property gets or sets the command time-out used to execute generated commands (`IDbCommands`). 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 当此属性未设置，默认值的用于查询命令执行。When this property is not set, the default value of is used for query command execution. 此默认值将由存储提供程序。This default value is set by the storage provider. 请注意，某些提供程序可能会引发异常，是否此值设置为非零值。Note that some providers may throw exceptions if this value is set to a non-zero value.

summary.span: 获取由框架使用的连接。

span.span: Gets the connection used by the framework.
The connection used by the framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性与关系 ADO.NET 代码交互操作。You can use this property to interoperate with relational ADO.NET code. 返回的连接将关闭，除非已由用户显式打开。The returned connection will be closed unless it has been explicitly opened by the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CreateDatabase() cil managed

summary.span: 在服务器上创建数据库。

span.span: Creates a database on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用以下算法派生的数据库的名称：The name of the database is derived by using the following algorithm: 1. 如果在连接字符串中标识数据库，则使用其名称。If a database is identified in the connection string, its name is used. 1. 如果属性是存在，其属性用作数据库的名称。If a attribute is present, its property is used as the name of the database. 1. 如果没有数据库标记中的连接字符串和强类型化使用时，具有相同的名称的数据库创建继承类。If there is no database tag in the connection string and a strongly typed is used, a database that has the same name as the inheriting class is created. 1. 如果使用弱类型是使用，将引发异常。If a weakly typed is used, an exception is thrown. 1. 如果造成了通过使用文件名称，创建到该文件的名称相对应的数据库。If the has been created by using a file name, the database corresponding to that file name is created. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置一个临时数据库，然后删除它。The following code shows how to set up a temporary database and then remove it. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/vb/Module1.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/vb/Module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DeferredLoadingEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DeferredLoadingEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示延迟加载是一对多还是一对一的关系。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to delay-load one-to-many or one-to-one relationships.

value.span: 如果启用延迟加载，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if deferred loading is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回代码访问这些关系，null 之一时，如果关系是一对一的并且如果它是一个多，则返回空集合。When the code accesses one of these relationships, null is returned if the relationship is one-to-one, and an empty collection is returned if it is one-to-many. 仍可通过设置填充关系属性。The relationships can still be filled by setting the property. 此属性的主要方案是，可以提取一种对象模型并向它发出 （例如，Web 服务）。The main scenario for this property is to enable you to extract a piece of the object model and send it out (for example, to a Web service). > [!NOTE] > 如果此属性设置为`false`执行查询后，将引发异常。If this property is set to `false` after a query has been executed, an exception is thrown. 请参阅**有效的模式**部分获取详细信息。See the **Valid Modes** section below for more information. ## 有效的模式Valid modes 延迟的加载需要对象跟踪。Deferred loading requires object tracking. 仅以下三种模式是有效的：Only the following three modes are valid: - = `false`。 = `false`. 被忽略，在推断为`false`。 is ignored and inferred to be `false`. 此行为对应于一个只读的。This behavior corresponds to a read-only . - = `true`。 = `true`. = `false`。 = `false`. 这种情况下对应于允许用户使用加载的对象图指令，但它不会启用延迟的加载。This situation corresponds to a that allows users to load an object graph by using directives, but it does not enable deferred loading. - 两者都设置为`true`。Both are set to `true`. 这是默认设置。This is the default. 在执行查询后，不能更改标志。The flags may not be changed after a query has been executed. 使用此信息在第一个查询执行后的任何更改将引发异常。Any change after the execution of the first query that uses that throws an exception.

summary.span: 直接对数据库执行 SQL 命令。

span.span: Executes SQL commands directly on the database.

returns.span: 执行的命令修改的行数。

span.span: The number of rows modified by the executed command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是一种传递机制的情况下，[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]不充分提供用于特定方案。This method is a pass-through mechanism for cases where [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] does not adequately provide for a particular scenario. 该命令的语法是用于创建 ADO.NET 的语法几乎相同`DataCommand`。The syntax for the command is almost the same as the syntax used to create an ADO.NET `DataCommand`. 唯一区别是在指定参数的方式。The only difference is in how the parameters are specified. 具体而言，将它们括在大括号 （{...}） 来指定参数和枚举它们从 0 开始。Specifically, you specify parameters by enclosing them in braces ({…}) and enumerate them starting from 0. 该参数是与参数数组中的同等带编号对象相关联。The parameter is associated with the equally numbered object in the parameters array. `ExecuteQuery` 和`ExecuteCommand`，可以指定的参数替换的参数数目可变。`ExecuteQuery` and `ExecuteCommand` allow you to specify a variable number of arguments for parameter substitution. 例如，可以指定参数调用 ExecuteQuery 时\:For example, you can specify the parameters when invoking ExecuteQuery\: ``` db.ExecuteQuery("select * from dbo.Customers where City = {0}", "London"); ``` 而且，另一个示例：And, another example: ``` db.ExecuteCommand("UPDATE Products SET QuantityPerUnit = {0} WHERE ProductID = {1}", "24 boxes", 5); ``` 下面的示例打开一个连接，并将传递 SQL `UPDATE` SQL 引擎命令。The following example opens a connection and passes a SQL `UPDATE` command to the SQL engine. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase/vb/Module1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在删除重写方法中执行，以向 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 重新委托生成和执行删除操作的动态 SQL 的任务。

span.span: Executes, inside delete override methods, to redelegate to [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] the task of generating and executing dynamic SQL for delete operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 。See .

Protected Friend Sub ExecuteDynamicInsert (entity As Object)

param.name: entity
param.span: 要插入的实体。

span.span: The entity to be inserted.

summary.span: 在插入重写方法中执行，以向 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 重新委托生成和执行插入操作的动态 SQL 的任务。

span.span: Executes, inside insert override methods, to redelegate to [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] the task of generating and executing dynamic SQL for insert operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意以下事项：Note the following considerations: - 由于该方法具有受保护的修饰符，使用它必须子类化。Because the method has a protected modifier, its use requires subclassing . - 如果在未调用此操作，则引发异常操作。An exception is thrown if this operation is not called inside a operation. 不应作为独立操作的作用域之外调用操作。It is not intended to be called as a stand-alone operation outside the scope of a operation. 自身调用重写方法如果它们实现，它的上一个方法用于在重写方法调用。 itself calls override methods if they are implemented and the previous methods are intended to be called inside the override methods. - 它负责的开发人员传递正确的实体。It is the responsibility of the developer to pass in the correct entity. 实现验证传入的实体进行跟踪。The implementation verifies that the passed-in entity is tracked. 但是，它负责的开发人员来保持顺序，或传递同一实体中两次。However, it is the responsibility of the developer to maintain the order or pass in the same entity two times. - 它负责调用正确的动态 API，开发人员。It is the responsibility of the developer to invoke the correct dynamic API. 例如，在`Update`重写方法中，只能可以调用方法。For example, in the `Update` override method, only the method can be called. [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不检测或验证调用的动态方法是否与适用的操作相匹配。does not detect or verify whether the invoked dynamic method matches the applicable operation. 如果调用不适用的方法，则结果不确定 (例如，调用要更新的对象)。The results are undefined if an inapplicable method is called (for example, calling for an object to be updated).

summary.span: 直接对数据库执行 SQL 查询并返回对象。

span.span: Executes SQL queries directly on the database and returns objects.

returns.span: 由查询返回的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects returned by the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是一种传递机制的情况下，[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]不提供用于特定方案。This method is a pass-through mechanism for cases where [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] does not provide for a particular scenario. 对字段的查询结果中的匹配列和属性的对象中的算法工作方式如下：The algorithm for matching columns in the result of the query to fields and properties in the object works as follows: - 如果字段或属性映射到特定列名称，则结果集中应包含该列名称。If a field or property is mapped to a particular column name, that column name is expected in the resultset. - 如果未映射字段或属性，则结果集中应包含其名称与该字段或属性相同的列。If a field or property is not mapped, a column with the same name as the field or property is expected in the resultset. - 通过第一个查找区分大小写匹配来执行比较。The comparison is performed by first looking for a case-sensitive match. 如果未找到这样的匹配，不区分大小写的匹配项会继续搜索。If such a match is not found, a subsequent search occurs for a case-insensitive match. - 查询必须返回所有跟踪的字段和属性的对象 （除延迟加载） 满足所有以下都条件：The query must return all the tracked fields and properties of the object (apart from those subject to deferred loading) when all the following are true: - 如果``显式跟踪的实体由。If `` is an entity explicitly tracked by the . - ObjectTrackingEnabled 是如此。ObjectTrackingEnabled is true. - 实体具有主键。The entity has a primary key. 否则会引发异常。Otherwise an exception is thrown. - 在所有其他情况下，查询可以检索只跟踪的字段和对象的属性的子集。In all other cases, the query can retrieve just a subset of the tracked fields and properties for the object. 以下 C# 代码片段显示了此方法的一个用途：The following C# snippet shows one use for this method: ``` var customers = db.ExecuteQuery(@"SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName, ContactName, ContactTitle, Address, City, Region, PostalCode, Country, Phone, Fax FROM dbo.Customers WHERE City = {0}", "London"); foreach (Customer c in customers) Console.WriteLine(c.ContactName); ``` 在 Visual Basic 中In Visual Basic ``` Dim customers = db.ExecuteQuery(Of Customer)("SELECT CustomerID, _ CompanyName, ContactName, ContactTitle, _ Address, City, Region, PostalCode, Country, Phone, Fax _ FROM dbo.Customers _ WHERE City = {0}", "London") For Each c As Customer In customers Console.WriteLine(c.ContactName) Next ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.Linq.ChangeSet GetChangeSet() cil managed

summary.span: 获取由 跟踪的被修改对象。

span.span: Gets the modified objects tracked by .

span.span: The set of objects is returned as three read-only collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意以下事项：Note the following considerations: - 可能会产生副作用，如插入的推理并删除时通常执行的操作。 might have side effects, such as inference of insert and delete operations that are usually performed at the time of . 例如，以下操作中使用的对象可以创建以下列表中相应的推断的操作：For example, objects that are used in the following operations can create corresponding inferred operations in the following list: - 到。 to . - null 赋值 (由于的可能到。 assignment to null (possibly because of to . - 不可能根据外键约束排序集。The set may not be ordered according to foreign key constraints. - 数据库生成的值 （例如，主键和外键的值、 时间戳，等等） 将不可用。Database-generated values (for example, primary and foreign key values, timestamps, and so forth) are not available. 此类信息需要执行数据库命令，可能是检索到的信息 （例如，从主键的外键） 的传播。Such information requires database command execution and perhaps the propagation of retrieved information (for example, foreign key from primary key). - 在调用时计算已更改的对象的集。The set of changed objects is computed at the time of the call. 对后续调用可以生成一组不同，如果进行其他更改。Subsequent calls to can produce a different set if additional changes are made. 在不进行任何更改后的输出显示，如下所示：Output when no changes have been made appears as follows: `{Added: 0, Removed: 0, Modified: 0}` ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqDebuggingSupport#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DLinqDebuggingSupport#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/vb/Module1.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets the information about SQL commands generated by [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)].
The requested command information object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是一个 getter，不会影响状态。This method is only a getter and does not affect state. 请注意以下事项：Note the following considerations: - 参数必须为非 null。The argument must be non-null. 否则，将空参数引发异常。Otherwise, a null argument exception is thrown. - 正常查询期间引发的转换异常[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]不能转换为查询应用查询执行。Normal query translation exceptions thrown during [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] query execution apply for a query that cannot be translated. - 返回仅第一个查询命令。Only the first query command is returned. 具体而言，用于预先加载的其他命令 () 不包括在内。Specifically, additional commands that are used for eager loading () are not included. - 不跟踪用户与该命令。 does not track what the user does with the command. 例如，返回命令执行的结果不跟踪，并且不会影响状态。For example, results from the execution of the returned command are not tracked and do not affect state. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqDebuggingSupport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DLinqDebuggingSupport#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/vb/Module1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是弱类型化的版本。This is a weakly typed version of . 请务必已弱类型化的版本，因为它是动态构建的查询相对较常见的做法。It is important to have a weakly typed version because it is a relatively common practice to construct queries dynamically. 它会强制应用程序使用反射来调用正确的泛型方法很不方便。It would be inconvenient to force the application to use reflection to call the correct generic method. 如果没有为特定类型集合，将引发异常。If there is no collection for a particular type, an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为`false`提高在检索时的性能，因为有较少的项来跟踪。Setting this property to `false` improves performance at retrieval time, because there are fewer items to track. 引发异常：An exception is thrown: - 如果该属性设置为`false`执行查询后。If the property is set to `false` after a query has been executed. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的有效模式部分。For more information, see the Valid Modes section in . - 如果该属性设置为`false`和调用。If the property is set to `false` and is called. 如果是`false`，被忽略，视为`false`。If is `false`, is ignored and treated as `false`. 在这种情况下，是只读的。In this case, the is read-only. 如果是`true`，是`false`。If is `true`, is `false`. 在这种情况下， ，你可以通过使用负载对象图指令，但不会启用延迟的加载。In this case, allows you to load an object graph by using directives, but does not enable deferred loading.

member this.QueryCacheEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 使用数据库中的数据刷新对象的状态。

span.span: Refreshes object state by using data in the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 开放式并发错误将引入另一次尝试的状态项后，此方法很有用。This method is useful after an optimistic concurrency error to bring items into a state for another attempt. 它将更新的基元字段和属性的对象的状态。It updates the state of the primitive fields and properties on the objects. > [!NOTE] > 如果对象位于*许多*将设置一个对多关系，该对象上的外键端和关系的另一端的对象指针将设置为新值。If an object is on the *many* side of a one-to-many relationship, the foreign key on the object will be set and the object pointer for the other side of the relationship will be set to the new value.

summary.span: 计算要插入、更新或删除的已修改对象的集，并执行相应命令以实现对数据库的更改。

span.span: Computes the set of modified objects to be inserted, updated, or deleted, and executes the appropriate commands to implement the changes to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在用于 insert、 update 或 delete，重写方法执行这些方法，而不是默认[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]命令。If override methods are present for insert, update, or delete, executes these methods instead of the default [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] commands. 启动一个事务，将回滚任何会发生异常时正在执行。 starts a transaction and will roll back if an exception occurs while is executing. 但是，这不会回滚所做的更改在内存中或由跟踪; 这些更改将需要手动回滚。However, this does not roll back the changes in memory or tracked by the ; those changes will need to be rolled back manually. 可以使用的新实例启动如果在内存中的更改被放弃。You can start with a new instance of the if the changes in memory are to be discarded.

summary.span: 计算要插入、更新或删除的已修改对象的集，并执行相应命令以实现对数据库的更改。

span.span: Computes the set of modified objects to be inserted, updated, or deleted, and executes the appropriate commands to implement the changes to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在用于 insert、 update 或 delete，重写方法执行这些方法，而不是默认[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]命令。If override methods are present for insert, update, or delete, executes these methods instead of the default [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] commands.

span.span: Valid arguments are as follows:

summary.span: 将对检索到的对象所做的更改发送到基础数据库，并指定提交失败时要采取的操作。

span.span: Sends changes that were made to retrieved objects to the underlying database, and specifies the action to be taken if the submission fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认故障模式是。Default failure mode is . ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.ConflictModeEnumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.conflictmodeenumeration/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.ConflictModeEnumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.conflictmodeenumeration/vb/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::Common::DbTransaction ^ Transaction { System::Data::Common::DbTransaction ^ get(); void set(System::Data::Common::DbTransaction ^ value); };
member this.Transaction : System.Data.Common.DbTransaction with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要用于访问数据库的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的本地事务。

span.span: Gets or sets a local transaction for the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to use to access the database.

value.span: 执行查询和命令时由 使用的事务对象。

span.span: The transaction object used by the when executing queries and commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的主要方案是使用关系的互操作性[!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)]代码。The primary scenario for this property is interoperability with relational [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] code. 例如，使用此属性，当您编写自己`Create` / `Update` / `Delete`方法，以便设置`Transaction`ADO 属性`Command`对象。For example, use this property when you write your own `Create`/`Update`/`Delete` methods to set the `Transaction` property on the ADO `Command` object. 请注意以下事项：Note the following: - 如果此属性未显式设置，getter 将返回 null。If this property has not been explicitly set, the getter returns null. - 如果在中执行代码上下文中，设置此属性将引发异常。If the code is executing in a context, setting this property throws an exception. - 如果此属性设置了一个新是打开，将引发异常时执行的查询或更新。If this property is set and a new is opened, an exception is thrown when a query or update is executed.

summary.span: 将现有 转换为对象。

span.span: Converts an existing to objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的每一行转换中的对象为。Each row in the is converted to an object in the . ``` public IEnumerable Translate(IDataReader reader) {} ``` 说明： 此方法用于将转换的现有对象。Description: This method is used to convert an existing to objects. 中的每一行转换中的对象为。Each row in the is converted to an object in the . **泛型参数：****Generic parameters:** `T`： 请参阅。`T`: See . **参数：****Parameters:** `Query`： 请参阅下面的命令的说明。`Query`: See the description for command under . `Parameters`： 请参阅下的参数的说明。`Parameters`: See the description for parameters under . **返回类型：****Return type:** ： 由转换返回的对象的集合。: collection of objects returned by the conversion.

param.span: 要返回的 的类型。

span.span: The type of the to be returned.

param.span: 使查询结果中的列与对象中的字段和属性相匹配的算法如下所示：

span.span: The algorithm for matching columns in the result to fields and properties in the object works as follows:

param.span: 如果字段或属性映射到特定列名称，则结果集中应包含该列名称。

span.span: If a field or property is mapped to a particular column name, that column name is expected in the resultset.

param.span: 如果未映射字段或属性，则结果集中应包含其名称与该字段或属性相同的列。

span.span: If a field or property is not mapped, a column with the same name as the field or property is expected in the resultset.

param.span: 通过先查找区分大小写的匹配来执行比较。

span.span: The comparison is performed by looking for a case-sensitive match first.

param.span: 如果未找到匹配项，则会继续搜索不区分大小写的匹配项。

span.span: If this match is not found, a subsequent search is occurs for a case-insensitive match.

param.span: 如果同时满足下列所有条件，则该查询应当返回（除延迟加载的对象外的）对象的所有跟踪的字段和属性：

span.span: The query must return all the tracked fields and properties of the object (except those that are loaded on a deferred basis) when all the following conditions are true:

param.span: T 是由 显式跟踪的实体。

span.span: T is an entity explicitly tracked by the .
